caption.p: GvHD and transplant outcomes in patients treated with tocilizumab versus a matched CIBMTR control population. (A). Cumulative incidence of grades II-IV aGvHD in patients treated with tocilizumab versus the matched control cohort. (B). Probability of grades II-IV aGvHD-free survival. (C). Cumulative incidence of cGvHD, (D) transplant-related mortality, and (E) relapse. (F) Probability of disease-free survival in patients treated with tocilizumab versus the matched control cohort. Toc: tocilizumab: Tac: tacrolimus; MTX: methotrexate.
